dict.acceptation: 破坏，毁灭；使破产；使没落，使堕落；变成废墟；
毁灭，灭亡；废墟，遗迹；[灭亡]的原因，祸根；损失；

sent.orig: Gin is called mother's ruin because it can ruin a family.
sent.trans: 杜松子酒是一种烈性饮料，因为它能毁灭一个家庭。

sent.orig: Drink was his father's ruin and it will be the ruin of him too!
sent.trans: 酗酒是他父亲毁灭的原因，他也将遭同样的厄运！

sent.orig: Gambling was his ruin[the ruin of him].
We searched village after village, ruin after ruin, country after country, and always we found nothing.
sent.trans: 我们找寻了一个村庄又一个村庄，一个废墟又一个废墟，一个国家又一个国家，却什么也找不到。

sent.orig: It will ruin nations and in their ruin they will strike out.
sent.trans: 这将令国家毁灭，在毁灭的过程中，它们将会出局。
